client_id.title: ClientID
client_id.description: Your Plaid API `client_id`. The `client_id` is required and may be provided either in the `PLAID-CLIENT-ID` header or as part of a request body.

secret.title: APISecret
secret.description: Your Plaid API `secret`. The `secret` is required and may be provided either in the `PLAID-SECRET` header or as part of a request body.

start_date.description: The start datetime of transfers to list. This should be in RFC 3339 format (i.e. `2019-12-06T22:35:49Z`)

end_date.description: The end datetime of transfers to list. This should be in RFC 3339 format (i.e. `2019-12-06T22:35:49Z`)

count.description: The maximum number of transfers to return.

offset.description: The number of transfers to skip before returning results.

originator_client_id.description: Filter transfers to only those with the specified originator client.

funding_account_id.description: Filter transfers to only those with the specified `funding_account_id`.
